title: Tommy Wolfe
text: Thomas Henry Wolfe (7 March 1900 – 1954) was a Welsh amateur <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="inside%20left">inside left</a> who played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Fulham%20F.C.">Fulham</a>, <a href="Southend%20United%20F.C.">Southend United</a>, <a href="Coventry%20City%20F.C.">Coventry City</a>, <a href="Charlton%20Athletic%20F.C.">Charlton Athletic</a> and <a href="Bristol%20Rovers%20F.C.">Bristol Rovers</a>. He was capped by Wales at <a href="Wales%20national%20amateur%20football%20team">amateur</a> level.
